/* eslint-disable react/no-unescaped-entities */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React from 'react'; import { Dismiss, Spinner, Button } from '@../../../../reactify/build'; import { simpleCode, disabledCode, customThemeCode, customColorCode, customEventCode, customIconCode, childrenCode, customClassCode, sizeCode, } from './code-refrence'; import './dismiss.scss'; import DemoCard from '../../components/demo-card'; const DismissDemo = () => (

); export default DismissDemo;
